mapper.select: select lf.LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_ST_COIN, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, NVL(s.STOCK_AMOUNT, 0) AS STOCK_AMOUNT from cart c left join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on c.LF_ID = lf.LF_ID LEFT join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on c.LF_OPT_ID = lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID LEFT join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID LEFT join STOCK s on lf.LF_ID = s.LF_ID and lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = s.LF_OPT_ID where c.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 0

-- 프리미엄 장바구니 -- select lf.LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_PR_PRICE, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, NVL(s.STOCK_AMOUNT, 0) AS STOCK_AMOUNT, lf.LF_PR_MIN_PERIOD from cart c left join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on c.LF_ID = lf.LF_ID left join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on c.LF_OPT_ID = lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID left join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID left join STOCK s on lf.LF_ID = s.LF_ID and lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = s.LF_OPT_ID where c.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 1
